name: Puzzle Pond
description:
Little concept game I made in around a month. 

You have lost your friend Carlos and have to go find them. Solve puzzles (not really) in a pond (REAL). 20 Levels of okayish gameplay!

NOTE:

Due to the rushed nature of the release there are some bug that  have kind of janky work arounds to solve until further notice

If you find yourself not able to jump when you should Press 'S'

If a level is too hard or unplayable due to a bug Press 'Right Shift' 

'Esc' to quit
